￼















Customer Management

1 min
onprintshop admin panel allows you to review your customers, view their details, manage customer information, add customers offline, manage their pay on account, create user groups for sale and discounts and tax purposes you can also manually add, amend, import, or delete a customer profile depending on the circumstances you can build a customer group if you want to send discounts or emails to a specific group of clients learn how you can manage your customer details or export the customer details via csv format managing customers managing customers understand customers, their account activities, and their relationship with your products import customers import customers learn the import/export function of the module to streamline customer management
Did this page help you?
